==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じゅう|いち|がつ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
十一 (じゅういち, ''jūichi''), "eleven" ([[十]], "ten" + [[一]], "one") + [[月]] (がつ, ''gatsu''), "month"

===Pronunciation===

===Noun===

# [[November]]

====Synonyms====
